languages.text: When the wearer kills an enemy with the Finish the Job ability, the wearer gains a +20% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} and removes the {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} on their Orchestrated Firestorm and Last Volley {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}

traits.locale_text: [draft] When the wearer kills an enemy with using Finish the Job , wearer gains +20% Damage for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} and removes {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} on their Directed Firestorm and Last Volley {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}

When the wearer kills an enemy with the Finish the Job ability, the wearer gains a +20% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to damage for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} and removes the {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} on their Directed Firestorm and Last Volley {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}

When the wearer kills an enemy with the Finish the Job ability, the wearer gains a +20% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} and removes the {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} on their Orchestrated Firestorm and Last Volley {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}

languages.text: 每当装备者使用完成任务这个能力杀死敌人时，装备者都会获得20%{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}，效果持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。此外，立刻消除枪炮奏鸣与最终齐射{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}冷却时间{/g}。
languages.original_text: When the wearer kills an enemy with the Finish the Job ability, the wearer gains a +20% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} and removes the {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} on their Orchestrated Firestorm and Last Volley {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}

traits.locale_text: 每当装备者使用完成任务这个能力杀死敌人时，装备者都会获得20%伤害{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}，效果持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。此外，立刻消除定向焰暴与最终齐射{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}冷却时间{/g}。

languages.text: 着用者がとどめのアビリティで敵を殺すと、着用者は1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}間の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}に+20%の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を得て、自身のうねるファイアストームと最後の斉射の{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}クールダウン{/g}を取り除く
languages.original_text: When the wearer kills an enemy with the Finish the Job ability, the wearer gains a +20% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} and removes the {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} on their Orchestrated Firestorm and Last Volley {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}

traits.locale_text: 着用者が仕事の完了アビリティで敵を殺すと、着用者は1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間ダメージに20％の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}獲得し、自身の炎嵐の指揮と最後の斉射の{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}クールダウン{/g}を取り除く。

languages.text: Cuando el portador mata a un enemigo con la capacidad Terminar el trabajo, el portador gana una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} de +20 % a su {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g} y elimina el {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}tiempo de recuperación{/g} de sus {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} Tormenta de fuego coordinada y Salva final.
languages.original_text: When the wearer kills an enemy with the Finish the Job ability, the wearer gains a +20% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} and removes the {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} on their Orchestrated Firestorm and Last Volley {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}

traits.locale_text: Cuando el portador mata a un enemigo con la capacidad Terminar el trabajo, el portador gana una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} de +20 % a su daño durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g} y elimina el {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}tiempo de recuperación{/g} de sus {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} Tormenta de fuego dirigida y Salva final.

languages.text: Wenn der Träger einen Feind mit der Fähigkeit Die Aufgabe erledigen tötet, erhält er für 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} einen {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} von +20 % auf {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} und entfernt die {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Abklingzeit{/g} seiner {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} Geplanter Feuersturm und Letzte Salve.
languages.original_text: When the wearer kills an enemy with the Finish the Job ability, the wearer gains a +20% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} and removes the {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} on their Orchestrated Firestorm and Last Volley {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}

traits.locale_text: Wenn der Träger einen Feind mit der Fähigkeit Die Aufgabe erledigen tötet, erlangt er einen {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Schadensbonus{/g} von +20 % für 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} und entfernt die {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Abklingzeit{/g} ihrer {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} Gezielter Feuersturm und Letzte Salve.

languages.text: Убивая противника способностью Завершить начатое, персонаж получает {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} +20% к наносимому {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урону{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g} и мгновенно завершает восстановление {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способностей{/g} Направленный шквал и Последний рывок.
languages.original_text: When the wearer kills an enemy with the Finish the Job ability, the wearer gains a +20% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to damage for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} and removes the {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} on their Directed Firestorm and Last Volley {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}

traits.locale_text: Убивая противника способностью Завершить начатое, персонаж получает {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} +20% к наносимому урону на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g} и мгновенно завершает {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}восстановление{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способностей{/g} Направленный шквал и Последний рывок.

Убивая противника способностью Завершить начатое, персонаж получает {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} +20% к наносимому урону на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g} и мгновенно завершает {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}восстановление{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способностей{/g} Направленный шквал и Последний рывок.

languages.text: Lorsque l'utilisateur élimine un ennemi à l'aide de la capacité Finir le Travail, il reçoit un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} de +20 % pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, et le {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}délai de récupération{/g} de ses {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} Tempête de Feu Orchestrée et Dernière Salve est annulé.
languages.original_text: When the wearer kills an enemy with the Finish the Job ability, the wearer gains a +20% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} and removes the {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} on their Orchestrated Firestorm and Last Volley {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}

traits.locale_text: Lorsque l'utilisateur élimine un ennemi à l'aide de la capacité Finir le Travail, il reçoit un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de dégâts de +20 % pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, et le {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}délai de récupération{/g} de ses {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} Tempête de Feu Dirigée et Dernière Salve est annulé.
